alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 4:10PM EDT until April 19 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield, Southern New London, Southern Middlesex and Southern New Haven Counties. In New York, Southern Nassau, Northwest Suffolk, Northern Nassau, Southwest Suffolk, Southeast Suffolk and Northeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
